page.title: 17Sigglesthorne's local towns
page.content: The main places where people who live in Sigglesthorne shop are {Beverley, Hornsea}and{Hull.}People who live here travel in their cars or catch the bus to get there. { Hornsea}is a local town approximatley 3 miles from Sigglesthorne. It is a seaside town. It is used for shopping for major food as well as clothes, shoes etc... { Beverley}is about 12 miles away from Sigglesthorne. It is quite big and most people go there for clothes. It is also used for food and it has a large market and some big toy shops. { Hull}is the biggest and most popular city in this area. It has a large railway station and a lot of department stores. Most people have to travel to Hull for major services. It is approximatley 14 miles from Sigglesthorne.
